Daly_City.KREV (FM):
KREV (92.7 FM), branded as 92.7 REV The Revolution, is a Top 40 (CHR) music formatted radio station that serves the greater San Francisco Bay Area. Its city of license is Alameda, California, and it is owned by Golden State Broadcasting LLC. The station's studios are located in the Visitacion Valley district of San Francisco, and the transmitter is located on top of Bellaire Tower in the city's Russian Hill neighborhood.


== History ==


=== Jazz music as KJAZ ===
See also KJAZ
As KJAZ from August 1, 1959, to July 31, 1994, the station aired a jazz format.
